Articles.Content:
Just in case anyone else is looking for it, I had to do quite a bit of digging in the KSPTV channel archive to find the 3AM EDT broadcast ... not sure why it was buried so far!

Anyway, here it is: http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/b/513842470
EnterElysium has a preview video up on his YouTube channel as well. The asteroids are awesome looking
